user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill my need for comfortable, durable, and well-fitting underwear that I could wear daily without any discomfort.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable underwear that would fit well and feel soft against my skin. The emphasis on durability and the promise of retaining color and softness over time were significant factors in my decision. I appreciated the tag-free design, which added to the comfort aspect, and the overall positive reviews about the fit and feel influenced my choice.

I wanted a comfortable and soft pair of boyshorts that I could wear throughout the day without discomfort. The description highlighted the softness and durability of the fabric, which appealed to me. The positive feedback regarding the value for the price also played a role in my decision-making process.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort and support, especially in clothing and footwear. I value items that are made from soft, high-quality materials that provide a good fit and can be worn for extended periods without discomfort. Features like adjustable straps, seamless designs, and breathable fabrics are particularly appealing to me. I also appreciate products that are versatile and can be used in various settings, whether casual or more formal. On the other hand, I tend to dislike items that lack proper support, have awkward shapes, or do not fit true to size. Poor quality and discomfort are significant turn-offs for me, as I seek value for my money and a pleasant wearing experience.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable, durable, and well-fitting underwear for daily wear without discomfort. within my expected price range: [15.97, 29.48]
What specific style or design do you prefer for your daily underwear, such as briefs, boxers, trunks, or others?
I prefer boyshorts for my daily underwear. They offer a good balance between comfort and coverage, which is important to me.
What fabric material do you prefer for your daily underwear to ensure both comfort and durability?

I generally prefer underwear made from soft and breathable materials like cotton or modal. These fabrics provide a comfortable feel against my skin and are durable enough for daily wear. Softness and breathability are key factors for me when choosing underwear.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Boyshort Underwear> / Item ID: B0BB767B8M / Price: $10.49 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear come in a convenient pack of 6 pairs. They offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features like the breathable ultra soft ring spun cotton and an ultra soft, plush back waistband that won't pinch or bind and no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Designed with excellent coverage, these panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. The boyshort style provides full coverage front and back.. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Women's Eversoft Cotton Brief Underwear, Tag Free & Breathable, Available in Plus Size> / Item ID: B0956HNH2Y / Price: $15.97 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Start your day off right with Fruit of the Loom’s newly reinvented cotton boyshorts. The style you love is now softer than ever and built for all day comfort. We’ve used a finer yarn to create a wonderfully soft feel that will have you ready to tackle the day. These boy shorts come with a durable, plush-backed waistband that is guaranteed to remain ravel free wash after wash, and as always, our Fruit of the Loom panties are tag free and made with a 100% cotton liner for ultimate comfort.']
